name.en: Challenge and Opportunity in Earth Sciences
name.ch: 地球科學的挑戰與機會

goal.en: Continued the "Introduction to Earth Sciences" class (GP1019) in the previous semester, this class expects to provide the first-grade students the link between the department's professional fields and some related key industries in the nation. Through lectures by industry experts and peer discussions, students learn about challenges from global environment and resource, and multidisciplinary job opportunities and markets they will potentially bring.
goal.ch: 本課程延續地科系大一上學期的「地球科學通論」課(GP1019)，主要目標在提供大一學生對本系的專業領域與現今國家相關重點產業間的連結，並透過業界專家演講與同儕討論，認識身為地科人在未來可能接受的全球環境與資源挑戰與其所帶出的跨領域就業機會與市場。

content.en: Students are divided into 12 groups and focus on three main topics: green energy industry, geological hazards, and earthquake prediction.
content.ch: 本學期將所有學生分為12組，針對三項地科主題：綠能產業、地質災害、地震預測，分別進行探討。

method.ch: 講授 研討 其他

grading.en: The score of each student includes: (1) External score: average from audiences other than the team members, with three levels A-90, C-80. C-70; (2) Internal score: average from the self team members, with three levels A-7, C-5. C-3.
grading.ch: 每一項地科主題有4組學生負責報告(三項主題共12組學生)。各組中每位學生的分數為外評及內評之總和： 外評：組外聽眾給分取平均；給分標準為A-90, B-80, C-70 內評：組內成員互評取平均；給分標準為A-7, B-5, C-3
